items.q: When a society changes, it is inevitable that its language changes, too. The word inevitable means ____. a. possible b. impossible c. cannot be stopped d. not likely
Some people believe that borrowing words from English ____ the purity of their own language. a. threatening b. threaten c. threatens d. threatened
Many countries around the world have ____ English words for their everyday communication. a. borrowed b. threatened c. lost d. forgotten
Some people are upset that so many English words are used in their language. These people have tried to ____ English words from their communications. a. encourage b. eliminate c. preserve d. collect
Because some people do not want their native language to disappear, they are taking steps to ____ it. a. preservation b. preserves c. preserved d. preserve
The words because and as are used to ____. a. introduce a result of a situation b. show the reason for a situation c. show which events happen first d. tell a story

Which sentence has the correct punctuation? a. The French have concern that many English words are threatening the purity of the French language; consequently, they have tried to prevent the use of English and have even fined people for it. b. The have concern that many English words are threatening the purity of the French language; consequently they have tried to prevent the use of English and have even fined people for it. c. The French have concern that many English words are threatening the purity of the French language, consequently; they have tried to prevent the use of English and have even fined people for it. d. The French have concern, that many English words are threatening the purity of the French language; consequently; they have tried to prevent the use of English and have even fined people for it.

In a cause and effect essay, if the causes and effects are closely related, it's a good idea to ____. a. use the block method of organization b. use the chain method of organization c. use both the block method and chain method of organization d. arrange ideas in chronological order
Even though some people will not be happy about it, English words will continue to ____ all over the world. a. pop up b. be forgotten c. remain unused d. disappear

Which sentence has the correct punctuation? a. As, young children do not learn their native language many native languages are dying out. b. As young children do not learn their native language, many native languages are dying out. c. As young children ,do not learn their native language, many native languages are dying out. d. As young children do not learn their native, language many native languages, are dying out.
If something is invisible, _____. a. it can’t be divided b. it can’t be seen c. it can’t be understood d. it can’t be broken
If you don’t tell anyone about a secret, you are able to _____ the secret. a. hold b. make c. keep d. handle
Marines are soldiers who fight their battles _____. a. on land b. on the water c. in the air d. using computers
Another word for transmit is _____. a. carry b. understand c. send d. hide
If a message is undecipherable, _____. a. it can’t be understood b. it is difficult to understand c. it is written in code d. it is not written on paper
If a spy figures out the language of a secret message, we say she _____ the code. a. found b. upset c. learned d. cracked
The soldiers hoped to be able to _____ the message before it was delivered. a. intercept b. send c. decipher d. dip
A computer is an example of an electronic _____. a. lingo b. message c. code d. device
Were you able to figure out what _____ they were using? a. encode b. coding c. encoded d. code
Computers can send _____ messages. a. electron b. electronic c. electric d. electronically
Various types of codes have _____ for centuries. a. exist b. existence c. existed d. existing
It is impossible for people from different parts of China to _____ each other’s language. a. understanding b. understand c. understood d. understands
Hundreds of different languages are _____ in India. a. speaking b. speak c. spoken d. spoke
A fine is _____. a. a difficult problem b. a compliment c. an amount of money d. a discussion
If you are concerned about a situation, you are feeling _____. a. excited b. interested c. worried d. sad
When people want to preserve something, they want to _____ it. a. add to b. forget c. improve d. protect
Another word for threat is _____. a. danger b. change c. form d. misunderstanding
Only one effect in a cause and effect essay needs supporting examples.
The words as a result signal an effect.
The words therefore and consequently are added before a clause that describes a cause.
There are some groups of people who want to make English a universal language to prevent the misunderstanding that come with from language differences.
This sentence uses correct punctuation. English is the most universal language; therefore, it is used around the world for science and math.
In a cause and effect essay, always state the most important cause first.
If a sentence begins with as or because, always use a comma after the reason.
Language experts say that half the world's languages are dying because people don't know their native language's alphabet.
A simple way of writing a secret message is to write it using milk.
The most popular code used by children is pig Latin.
In World War II, the British used a machine to decode German messages.
Native American languages were used as codes during World War II.
The Japanese never cracked the Navajo code.
Webspeak is a language computer experts use when they talk to each other.
Businesses use systems of code to keep secrets from other businesses.
You should use a different transition to begin each paragraph of an essay.
Transitions used for chronological order can also be used to introduce a cause.
There are about 3,000 languages in the world.
English is the official language in over 100 countries.
In France, there were fines for using English words.
Today most of the citizens of Ireland speak Gaelic.

INSTRUCTIONS: Write a thesis statement for this introduction that describes one or more effects the loss of their languages might have on Native American society. Native American Languages Did you know that there are over 500 Native American Indian Tribes in the U.S. and over 100 Native languages? Native Americans have a rich cultural heritage, and the language of each tribe reflects the unique quality that identifies each community. However, not everyone in each tribe is able to read or speak his or her native language. Also, the younger generation thinks their native language is old-fashioned and they don't want to study it.
Write an essay that discusses what would happen to you if your native language disappeared.
